name: Mango Tango
description: A vibrant gin-based cocktail that combines tropical mango flavors with a hint of exotic spices, perfect for a fruity and refreshing experience.

name: Caribbean Breeze
description: A bubbly melon spritz that brings the taste of the Caribbean to your glass with refreshing melon and tropical undertones.

name: Dragons Zombie
description: A rum-forward cocktail with a unique twist, blending tropical fruit flavors with a touch of intense zest.

name: Monkeys Paradise
description: A lively banana spritz cocktail with a tropical, bubbly character and a hint of island sweetness.

name: Fragolas Spritz
description: A refreshing strawberry-forward spritz that captures the essence of summer with light, sweet berry flavors.

name: The Elixir
description: An enticing mix of raspberries and passion fruit, offering a balance of sweetness and tartness in a captivating cocktail.

name: Bahama Mama
description: A rich, sweet rum-based cocktail with tropical flavors, perfect for those seeking a classic island drink.

name: Watermelon Oasis
description: A refreshing Masticha-based cocktail with a juicy watermelon profile, ideal for a sweet and hydrating experience.

name: Sweet Amigo
description: A tequila-based cocktail that marries sweetness with a slight kick, embodying a playful twist on classic margarita flavors.

name: The Gardener
description: A gin-based cocktail with fresh botanical notes, perfect for those who enjoy a light, aromatic, and refreshing drink.

name: Picasso
description: A prosecco cocktail with delicate peach flavors, bringing an artistic and effervescent twist to any occasion.

name: Monkeys Paradise
description: A prosecco cocktail with a tropical banana twist, perfect for a light and fruity experience.

name: Fragolas Spritz
description: A bubbly strawberry delight made with Moschato D'asti, offering a crisp and fruity flavor profile.

name: Caribbean Breeze
description: A tropical vibe in a glass, this Moschato D'asti cocktail combines refreshing tropical flavors for a light, vacation-like experience.

name: Aegean Negroni
description: A bold twist on the classic Negroni, featuring gin and bitter flavors inspired by Mediterranean herbs and spices.

name: Dragons Zombie
description: A complex rum-based cocktail with a tropical twist, ideal for those who enjoy bold and layered flavors.

name: Spicy Columbus
description: A daring tequila cocktail with a spicy kick, designed for adventurous palates looking for a bold taste experience.

name: Smokey Aperol
description: A smokey and bitter-sweet cocktail with Aperol, delivering a complex mix of flavors with a hint of smoky intrigue.

name: Drunk Popcorn
description: An adventurous cocktail that blends sweet and salty elements with a surprise factor for the daring drinker.

name: Sweet Amigo
description: A straightforward tequila cocktail with sweet and salty notes, perfect for a satisfying, simple yet flavorful experience.
